snippet: A Fugitive Slave, named Harrison, from Virginia, was arrested yesterday near Dunkirk, and brought to this city. He is now in jail, and will be examined before the Commissioner at 2 o'clock, P. M.. Four others, against whom warrants had been issued...

byline.original: By Telegraph to The New-ork Times

lead_paragraph: A Fugitive Slave, named Harrison, from Virginia, was arrested yesterday near Dunkirk, and brought to this city. He is now in jail, and will be examined before the Commissioner at 2 o'clock, P. M.. Four others, against whom warrants had been issued, have escaped to Canada.
